question: David has 100 hectares of banana field. There are 35 bananas per hectare. David can harvest his bananas every 2 months. How many bananas can David harvest within a year?
answer:
David has 35*100= <<35*100=3500>>3500 bananas on his field.
David can harvest his bananas 12 / 2 = <<12/2=6>>6 times per year
Therefore David can harvest 3500*6 = <<3500*6=21,000>>21,000 bananas per year.
#### 21,000
